Package uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers

Interface Summary
DeletableManager  
IManager  
ManagerChangeHandler Handles changes made on a manager.
PullCallback Callback interface for methods that wait for synchronisation.
PushCallback Callback for a push response, it extends PullCallback so that if push and pull return the same data, this interface can be used for both.
 

Class Summary
CollectionCallRecorder Makes a number of method calls to various objects and
CollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager> Manages a collection of server side objects referenced by an id.
DeletableCollectionManager<Id,Man extends DeletableManager> Like a CollectionManager but allows items to be deleted.
DeletableListedCollectionManager<Id,Man extends DeletableManager>  
ImitatorPushCallback  
JsArrayStringSetConverter Converts a Javascript array of strings to a set of strings.
ListedCollectionManager<Id,Man extends IManager> Like CollectionManager but takes the ids of its managers from a requester.
Manager<PullData,PushData> A base class to manage a single item.
SingleTypeManager<Type> Like manager, but push and pull requests return exactly the same information.
SyncTracker Keep track of the synchronisation state of a manager.
 

Exception Summary
MissingRequesterException Raised when trying to push or pull without the requesters.
